A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible\, \"Kill the Past\" the main theme in the movie is also the biggest issue\, it's a movie that wants to do something new\, while trying to destroy everything it was build on.  I think the best way to describe it is\, trying to build a sky scrapper using it's own foundations as the building material.  All it adds up to is a demolition of failure that destroys what it stood on\, having the movie fall on it's face without anything to stand on.
